name: Adam Madden | Website & Graphic Design Portfolio Wireframe Template | Version 1 of 4
description:
Adam Madden Website Design Portfolio Wireframe..

An already brilliantly designed template that contained the wireframe of a Design Portfolio Website Homepage - created by the very talented, Jack Molloy!


Minimally I rearranged a few items and recklessly added a couple of accent shapes, a shade lighter, yet still blue & I quickly swapped identities (I will most likely use a different photo, possibly..) - This is Version One of Four Total Planned Versions Release of Redesigns).


With the release of Version Four, I hope to have a completely redesigned website that resembles that of - My Own Design Portfolio.


Eventually, I plan to build my next Website Design Agency with a very similar design & possibly even using the same loud blue-led branding. Alongside the Web Design Agency - I'll also offer Local Marketing Consulting Services. With all services, we'll always target the more locally-focused, Service-Based Small Business Owners that need us the most!


Thanks Again, Jack - for helping to inspire new designers & creators around the world.


  • Adam Madden


PS: If anyone spots ANY "followers" or just cool humans that will be happy to give critical feedback for designs, wireframe templates, & maybe a prototype, that friend's release - PLEASE Send Them - MY WAY! I truly enjoy feedback from other more established designers!


Thanks Yo!
